content: this small pouch measures roughly 4 by 4 when finished and is a perfect little pouch to store small items like your crystals coins a lip balm loose earbuds a key or two and so much more it works up quickly and can be adjusted by adding or removing row of the single_crochet you will need <75yds yarn i prefer cotton for this g6 4mm hook stitch marker needle to weave in ends terms to know single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet blo - back loop only
